KSCCF Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 34 Sales Assistant, Pharmacist Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 20, 2025, 10:06 IST
 Karnataka State Cooperative Consumers Federation Limited
 34 Jobs |  Posted On : 20-Aug-2025 |  Karnataka |  Salary : 12,500 to 29,600





The Karnataka State Cooperative Consumer Federation Limited (KSCCF) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 34 Pharmacist, First Division Assistant, and Sales Assistant Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, D. Pharm, and 12th can apply for the KSCCF Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Karnataka.

KSCCF Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Pharmacist	07	D. Pharm
First Division Assistant	10	Any Degree
Sales Assistant	17	12th

KSCCF Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

KSCCF Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the 

Written Test.
Interview.

KSCCF Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For SC/ST/PWD candidates: Rs. 500/-.
For all other candidates: Rs. 1000/-.

KSCCF Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 12,500/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 29,600/- per month.
How to Apply for the KSCCF Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the KSCCF Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	16-08-2025
Closing date	14-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
